agent: Complete Test Generation Pipeline with UI Integration

test_cases.title: Authentication Bypass Attempt
test_cases.description: Attempt to bypass authentication by injecting SQL into the username/password fields. Verify that the system prevents unauthorized access.
test_cases.expected_result: Authentication fails and an error message is displayed.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: Al-powered PRD Reviewer

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: Al-powered PRD Reviewer

test_cases.title: Data Encryption Validation
test_cases.description: Upload a PRD containing sensitive data (e.g., patient information). Verify that the data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
test_cases.expected_result: Data is encrypted using AES-256 or equivalent encryption standard.

test_cases.title: Access Control Test
test_cases.description: Attempt to access another user's uploaded PRD without proper authorization. Verify that access control mechanisms prevent unauthorized data access.
test_cases.expected_result: Access is denied, and an appropriate error message is displayed.

traceability.requirement_text: Competitive advantage: Existing tools often focus on grammar and spell-checking

kg_nodes.text: Competitive advantage: Existing tools often focus on grammar and spell-checking

test_cases.title: Session Timeout Validation
test_cases.description: Leave the application idle for the configured session timeout period. Verify that the session is automatically terminated and the user is required to re-authenticate.
test_cases.expected_result: Session terminates after the configured timeout, requiring re-authentication.

traceability.requirement_text: Actionable Feedback: Offer users targeted, constructive feedback to improve their PRDs.

kg_nodes.text: Actionable Feedback: Offer users targeted, constructive feedback to improve their PRDs.

test_cases.title: Password Complexity Enforcement
test_cases.description: Attempt to create an account with a weak password that does not meet the defined complexity requirements. Verify that the system enforces password complexity rules.
test_cases.expected_result: The system rejects the weak password and prompts the user to create a stronger password.

traceability.requirement_text: Easy Integration: Allow users to paste their PRD text directly or upload their document (e.g., .docx, .pdf, .txt) for instant analysis.

kg_nodes.text: Easy Integration: Allow users to paste their PRD text directly or upload their document (e.g., .docx

test_cases.title: GDPR Data Deletion Request
test_cases.description: Submit a GDPR data deletion request for a specific user. Verify that all personal data associated with the user is permanently deleted from the system.
test_cases.expected_result: All personal data is deleted, and the user account is deactivated.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: Al-powered PRD Reviewer

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: Al-powered PRD Reviewer

test_cases.title: Data Minimization Validation
test_cases.description: Upload a PRD with excessive personal data. Verify that the system only processes the data necessary for the PRD review and flags the excessive data.
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes only the necessary data and flags the excessive data for review.

traceability.requirement_text: The tool allows users to upload or paste a PRD, then analyzes and grades the content. It also provides actionable feedback to improve clarity, completeness, and alignment with best practices in product management.

test_cases.title: CCPA Opt-Out Request
test_cases.description: Submit a CCPA opt-out request for the sale of personal information. Verify that the system stops selling the user's personal information.
test_cases.expected_result: The system stops selling the user's personal information, and confirmation is provided to the user.

kg_nodes.text: ‚Ä¢ PRDs are central to product development: A well-written PRD aligns teams around

test_cases.title: HIPAA Compliance Validation
test_cases.description: Upload a PRD containing PHI (Protected Health Information). Verify that the system identifies and flags the PHI and enforces HIPAA compliance measures.
test_cases.expected_result: The system identifies and flags the PHI, enforcing HIPAA compliance measures such as data masking and access control.

test_cases.title: Anonymization Validation
test_cases.description: Upload a PRD and choose the option to anonymize the data after analysis. Verify that the data is properly anonymized and cannot be re-identified.
test_cases.expected_result: The data is properly anonymized, and re-identification is not possible.

test_cases.title: PRD Upload and Analysis
test_cases.description: Upload a valid PRD in English. Verify that the system successfully analyzes the PRD and provides a grade and suggestions.
test_cases.expected_result: The system analyzes the PRD, provides a grade, and offers relevant suggestions for improvement.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: Al-powered PRD Reviewer

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: Al-powered PRD Reviewer

test_cases.title: Section-Level Insights Validation
test_cases.description: Upload a PRD. Verify that the system provides section-level insights and suggestions for improvement (e.g., 'Add user personas').
test_cases.expected_result: The system provides specific suggestions for improving each section of the PRD.

test_cases.description: Access the Best Practices Library. Verify that users can browse relevant templates and resources.
test_cases.expected_result: Users can successfully browse and access templates and resources in the Best Practices Library.

test_cases.title: User Persona Suggestion

test_cases.expected_result: The system suggests adding user personas to the PRD.

test_cases.title: Structure Requirement Validation
test_cases.description: Upload a PRD document lacking structure (headers, bullet points). Verify that the system alerts the user about the need for better document structure.
test_cases.expected_result: The system alerts the user about the need for better document structure for optimal analysis.

test_cases.title: Confluence Integration Test
test_cases.description: Integrate the Al-powered PRD Reviewer with Confluence using the API. Verify that PRDs can be imported from Confluence for analysis.
test_cases.expected_result: PRDs are successfully imported from Confluence, and analysis can be performed.

test_cases.description: Integrate the Al-powered PRD Reviewer with Jira using the API. Verify that PRD analysis results can be exported to Jira issues.
test_cases.expected_result: PRD analysis results are successfully exported to Jira issues.

test_cases.description: Integrate the Al-powered PRD Reviewer with Notion using the API. Verify that PRDs stored in Notion can be accessed and analyzed.
test_cases.expected_result: PRDs stored in Notion can be accessed and analyzed by the system.

test_cases.title: Load Testing - Simultaneous Users
test_cases.description: Simulate 100 simultaneous users uploading and analyzing PRDs. Verify that the system remains stable and responsive.
test_cases.expected_result: The system remains stable and responsive under load, with acceptable response times.

test_cases.expected_result: The response time for PRD analysis is under 5 seconds.
